thread.title: Watch Alex Clare Sing From Rooftops in 'You'll Be Fine' Video: Exclusive Premiere
thread.title_full: Watch Alex Clare Sing From Rooftops in 'You'll Be Fine' Video: Exclusive Premiere

author: Alexa Shouneyia
title: Watch Alex Clare Sing From Rooftops in 'You'll Be Fine' Video: Exclusive Premiere
text:
Courtesy Photo Alex Clare "You'll Be Fine" 
Alex Clare just dropped a beautiful video for his track “You’ll Be Fine” premiering exclusively on Billboard today (Feb. 22). 
Filmed on a rooftop in Tel Aviv, the black and white visual features Chris Hargreaves and The Portnoy Brothers soulfully playing the stripped back, piano-led track with Clare crooning lyrics like, “Don't give in to your emotions/ 'Cause they'll get the best of you” 
Speaking about the track, Clare tells Billboard , “’You'll Be Fine’ is a shout to all those struggling with whatever it maybe that’s holding them back. You have to be aware of your own potential, and know that obstacles that seem today to be impassable mountains tomorrow will seem like tiny cracks in the pavement. You just have to hold on and keep pushing through.” 
“You’ll Be Fine” is off of Clare’s album Tail of Lions , which was released on Jan. 20 via ETC Recordings/Red Distribution. Check out the video below:
